name: WorldCountryData
0:
”Alexa, ask World Country Data what is the population of New Zealand”
”Alexa, ask World Country Data play the national anthem of Belgium”
”Alexa, ask World Country Data which countries export the most”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: world country data
des:
The CIA World Factbook contains data for 260+ countries. The data is in the public domain.

You can ask for country facts and lists:

What is the population of Chile?
Where is Mozambique?
How large is Turkey?
How many phones are in Albania?
What languages are spoken in Spain?
What are the major cities in Italy?
What countries border Serbia?
What are Mongolia's resources?
What are the agricultural products of New Zealand?
What are the industries of Germany?

You can ask for briefs:

Tell me about Canada
Brief me on the economy of Fiji

You can ask about leading countries in a category:

What country is the largest?
Which countries have the highest exports?
Which countries have the most Internet users?
What country has the lowest population?

You can listen to national anthems:

Play the national anthem of Australia

These country & region names are recognized:

Afghanistan, Akrotiri, Albania, Algeria, American, Samoa, Andorra, Angola, Anguilla, Antarctica, Antigua and Barbuda, Arctic Ocean, Argentina, Armenia, Aruba, Ashmore and Cartier Islands, Atlantic
